_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Bad principles and good principles [an10: Wrong view is a bad principle
Right view is a good principle
Wrong thought is a bad principle
Right thought is a good principle
Wrong speech is a bad principle
Right speech is a good principle
Wrong action is a bad principle
Right action is a good principle
Wrong livelihood is a bad principle
Right livelihood is a good principle
Wrong effort is a bad principle
Right effort is a good principle
Wrong mindfulness is a bad principle
Right mindfulness is a good principle
Wrong immersion is a bad principle
Right immersion is a good principle
Wrong knowledge is a bad principle
Right knowledge is a good principle
Wrong freedom is a bad principle
Right freedom is a good principle
Bad results and good results [an10.115:2: The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right view are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong thought are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right thought are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong speech are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right speech are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong action are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right action are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong livelihood are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right livelihood are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong effort are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right effort are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong mindfulness are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right mindfulness are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong immersion are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right immersion are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong knowledge are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right knowledge are good results
The many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong freedom are bad results
The many skillful qualities fully developed because of right freedom are good results
